main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 22 June 1956 in Terre Haute, Indiana, involving an object shaped like a medicine ball.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet and was lighted,The size of the object was estimated to be 15 to 20 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted for about three minutes,The witness believed the object could have been a weather balloon due to the overcast conditions,The winds in the area were from the southwest, coinciding with the object's movement.
witness description: Mrs [REDACTED], resident of Terre Haute, Indiana
